name: Adult Day Health Center
description: Bayview Hunters Point Adult Day Health serves as an extension of care, love, and support to families caring for their loved ones at home. It lifts up the spirits of those who would otherwise be isolated and homebound and it empowers elders and adults living with disabilities and chronic illnesses to stay engaged and remain active members in their community. Adult Day Health provides: - Personal Care Assistance - Registered Nurse Assistance - Social Work Services - Physical Therapy - Occupational
